omopColumns.name: provider_source_value

dataSource.name: DoctorId
dataSource.description: This GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONER works within the General Medical Practitioner Practice with which the PATIENT is registered.

omopColumns.query:
select distinct 
			DoctorId 
		from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics 
		where DoctorId is not null

			DoctorId 
		from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics
